title: 08/04 Football: Matthew Stafford Interview, Dolphins QB Situation
description:
On a Football Friday edition of the Pick Six Podcast, Nick Kostos and Will Brinson break down the Ryan Tannehill injury (:45) and whether or not the Dolphins should sign Colin Kaepernick or Jay Cutler (3:08). They break down Jerry Jones' comments on Ezekiel Elliott (9:19) and give their takes on the Hall of Fame Game (10:58)! The guys celebrate Tom Brady's 40th birthday by discussing his new book (20:30) and play a game: Is this a TB12 food product or not (21:24)? Jason La Canfora goes one-on-one with Lions QB Matthew Stafford (26:27) and joins the guys to break down the Lions (36:01), Titans (46:20) and Corey Davis' hamstring injury (50:13). JLC gives us the latest on Andrew Luck and the Colts (54:08) to close the show.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
